revised_title: Mineral Observations and Techniques for Finding Tin Mines in Cornwall and Devon
tldr: The author provides a detailed account of the methods used to locate and extract tin mines in Cornwall and Devon. They describe the process of identifying mineral veins, known as "loads," and the techniques used to dig and dress the ore. The author also explains the role of water in moving mineral stones and how to identify the presence of tin through its weight, porosity, and color.
